recipes.sourceName: Confessions of an Over Worked Mom

extendedIngredients.name: whole milk
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 cups whole milk, raw if you can

recipes.title: 14 Healthy No Bake Pie s From Scratch

winePairing.pairingText: No Bake Pie works really well with Lambrusco Dolce, Late Harvest Riesling, and Vin Santo. These wines are all sweet, which is important since wine should usually be sweeter than the food you're pairing with it. You could try Snake River Late Harvest Riesling. Reviewers quite like it with a 5 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 16 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Snake River Late Harvest Riesling
productMatches.description: Made from the grapes left to hang on the vine in our estate Arena Valley Vineyard, Late Harvest Riesling is our original dessert wine. Our 2011 has a limeade nose with a hint of minerals and a honey finish. Enjoy this wine with fruit based desserts or as a refreshing aperitif.

recipes.instructions: In a pan, heat the milk and ¼ cup sugar until bubbles form around the outside edges.In a large bowl, mix the egg yolks, ¼ cup sugar and corn starch..Pour the mixture into the milk/sugar mixture in the pan.Cook over medium heat, whisking constantly until it thickens.Remove from heat and stir in the dark chocolate chips until melted.Pour into the cooked pie crust and smooth the top.Top with homemade whipped cream if desired.Chill in the refrigerator at least 3 hours or overnight.

steps.step: In a pan, heat the milk and ¼ cup sugar until bubbles form around the outside edges.In a large bowl, mix the egg yolks, ¼ cup sugar and corn starch..
Pour the mixture into the milk/sugar mixture in the pan.Cook over medium heat, whisking constantly until it thickens.
Remove from heat and stir in the dark chocolate chips until melted.
Pour into the cooked pie crust and smooth the top.Top with homemade whipped cream if desired.Chill in the refrigerator at least 3 hours or overnight.
